amendatorysection.catchline: See note regarding referendum petition following the source at the end of the section. Legislative changes eliminating death penalty; effect.
amendatorysection.para: The changes made by Laws 2015, LB268, shall not (1) limit the discretionary authority of the sentencing court to order restitution as part of any sentence or (2) alter the discretion and authority of the Department of Correctional Services to determine the appropriate security measures and conditions during the confinement of any committed offender.

source.note: Section 29-2501 is a new statute enacted by Laws 2015, LB 268, section 22. According to Article III, section 3, of the Constitution of Nebraska, the provisions of LB 268 have been suspended due to the certification by the Secretary of State of sufficient signatures on referendum petitions to suspend the taking effect of such act until the same has been approved by the electors of the state. The question will be submitted to the voters at the November 2016 general election.
